name: Block 59
description:
Block 59 is a press and type crime game where you play as a detective. You will try and solve the murder of David Castillo. This is a small game and just something to play casually. However, read the clues carefully because they're the only way you can answer the question correctly. Don't worry about typing in full, complete sentences. Don't worry about caps either. Good luck!

Sample Question: Where is Kelly going?

Sample Answer: to the store.
